name: Taj West End, Bengaluru
shortDescription: Marry amid 20 acres of heritage gardens at Taj West End Bengaluru, a 130-year-old property offering unmatched outdoor celebration spaces, colonial charm, and legendary Taj hospitality.
longDescription:
Taj West End Bengaluru is one of India's most cherished heritage properties—a 130-year-old hotel set amid 20 acres of magnificent tropical gardens that create an atmosphere impossible to replicate. The property's extensive grounds, filled with century-old rain trees, flowering gardens, and heritage structures, provide outdoor wedding venues of exceptional beauty and variety.

The hotel's 117 rooms and suites blend heritage architecture with contemporary comfort. The gardens themselves are the star attraction, with multiple distinct settings available for different wedding events. From intimate garden alcoves to grand lawn celebrations, the venue configurations are remarkably flexible.
metaTitle: Taj West End Bengaluru Wedding | 20-Acre Heritage Garden Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Host your garden wedding at Taj West End Bengaluru. 20 acres of heritage gardens, 130 years of history, and venues for celebrations up to 600 guests.
address: Race Course Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India
